sense.def:
Kadar položaj
frustrates someone
, nekomu prepreči, da bi storil tisto, kar želi, zato ga to jezi ali vznemirja.

seg.quote: The lack of money depressed and frustrated him.
...the sobbing wife and the angry, frustrated husband.
It was frustrating to live at the sea's edge and be unable to swim.

sense.def:
To frustrate something
pomeni nekaj preprečiti, na primer načrt.

seg.quote: The government have frustrated further advance towards European union.
Many frustrated poets end up as teachers.
